meanings.sent1: I will cointer the number of apples in the basket.
meanings.sent2: She cointers the coins in her piggy bank every week.
meanings.sent3: The little girl decided to cointer all her toys before bedtime.
meanings.sent4: The teacher asked the students to cointer the words in the paragraph.
meanings.sent5: He cointered the steps it took to reach the mountain top.

meanings.definition: A person who counts or enumerates.
meanings.sent1: The cointer at the store tallied up the purchases.
meanings.sent2: My mom is a diligent cointer when it comes to our family expenses.
meanings.sent3: The cointer in the library got lost in the sea of books to count.
meanings.sent4: The little boy pretended to be a cointer while playing with his toys.
meanings.sent5: The cointer in the museum meticulously checked each artifact.
